h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide
content: To follow this, he'll put his sword away, then jump at you and slam the ball down. He'll then drag it around him. Both of these attacks can be avoided by keeping your distance. Attack when he's getting himself back together, and chip away at his health steadily.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
To follow this, he'll put his sword away, then jump at you and slam the ball down. He'll then drag it around him. Both of these attacks can be avoided by keeping your distance. Attack when he's getting himself back together, and chip away at his health steadily.
